[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Resultat but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:FinanceCosts, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:FinanceIncomeCost, ifrs-full:FinanceIncome All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentReceivables, ifrs-full:SharePremium, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill of 437,900,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 437,800,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -1. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill that should add to 437,900,000 are comprised of the following:
+ Goodwill 229,500,000 + IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill 208,300,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill Total Value : 437,900,000 Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -1 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300NGO5XAJ6TL8719/2021-12-31/ESEF/SE/0/mcap-2021-12-31-sv.zip/mcap-2021-12-31-sv/reports/mcap-2021-12-31-sv.xhtml 6211

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 02 - Resultat includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities of 127,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 127,100,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 1. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities that should add to 127,000,000 are comprised of the following:
- ChangesInInventoriesOfFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProgress 1,900,000 - DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 75,500,000 - EmployeeBenefitsExpense 272,700,000 - MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense 4,700,000 - OtherExpenseByNature 111,900,000 + OtherIncome 23,300,000 + OtherWorkPerformedByEntityAndCapitalised 10,000,000 - RawMaterialsAndConsumablesUsed 355,800,000 + RevenueFromContractsWithCustomers 916,300,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 02 - Resultat. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
